entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Welland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:45 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 10.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Welland-Pelham 8:00 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: 10.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Dewpoint: 6.8°C
Wind: SW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
